```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(reshape2)
library(ROCR)
library(plyr)
library(WVPlots)

set.seed(34903490)
x = rnorm(50)
y = 0.5*x^2 + 2*x + rnorm(length(x))
frm = data.frame(x=x,y=y,yC=y>median(y))
```

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
ScatterPlot(frm, "x", "y", smoothmethod="lm", title="Example Linear Fit", annot_size=2)
```

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
frm$absY <- abs(frm$y)
gainCurve(frm, "x", "absY", title="Example Continuous Gain Curve")
```

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
gainCurve(frm, "x", "yC", title="Example Discrete Gain Curve")
```

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
plotROC(frm, "x", "yC", title="Example ROC plot")
```

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
doubleDensity(frm, "x", "yC", title="Example double density plot")
```

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
doubleHistogram(frm, "x", "yC", title="Example double histogram plot")
```

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
conditionalDistributionPlot(frm, "x", "yC", title="Example conditional distribution plot")
```
